      This method will move the enemy in a random direction based on the int returned when Dice.roll(int) is called.

      This method will move the Enemy object on the Grid while also checking to see if a Player needs to be stabbed.

      This method will reveal a location one block ahead of wherever the Player is looking.

      This method serves to overwrite the Game Object Grid by calling overwriteGOG(GameObject[][]) where the [][] is the first object read by File_Handler.ois.

      This method will reveal two spaces in the desired direction on the Grid based on user input.

      This method will remove a location visible from wherever the Player was looking.
      void File_Handler.saveFile(Grid grid, Player plr)
